sentence: The  resolution  came  after  more  than  four  months  of  war  between  Israel  and  the  Palestinian  militant  group  Hamas,  which  rules  Gaza  and  whose  attack  in  Israel  killed  1,200  people,  according  to  Israel's  government.
Israel's  military  offensive  since  then  has  killed  more  than  29,000  Palestinians  in  Gaza,  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry.
